name: Point(x,y,z)
shortDescription: Creates a Point Object from X, Y, and Z coordinate values

name: Evaluate Curve at Parameter
shortDescription: Given an input curve 'C' and parameter 't', find the position and tangent at that parameter

name: Distance(p1,p2)
shortDescription: Measures the distance between two supplied points

name: Shift List
shortDescription: Removes items from the beginning of a data list, and optionally tacks them back onto the end

name: Graft Tree
shortDescription: Creates a separate branch for each data item in the supplied tree

name: Boolean Toggle
shortDescription: This component gives you a convenient way to switch between a single True or False value

name: False
shortDescription: Outputs a boolean False value

name: True
shortDescription: Outputs a boolean True value

name: Circle(Center,Normal, Radius)
shortDescription: Outputs a circle curve based on a center point, normal vector, and radius

name: NURBS Curve
shortDescription: Generates a new Curve object based on a list of control points

name: Interpolated Curve
shortDescription: Generates a new Curve object that will pass through each point in a supplied list of points. Parametricization is automatic.

name: Offset Curve
shortDescription: Offsets a curve with a specified distance

name: Number
shortDescription: Holds a list of numbers. For short lists, you can enter the numbers directly into the component

name: Series
shortDescription: Generates a list of numbers. You can control the start of the list, the increment, and the number of values

name: Slider
shortDescription: A convenient way to change numerical values on the fly. Shows a touch/mouse-enabled slider

name: Vector(p1,p2)
shortDescription: Generates a new vector based on input points

name: Vector(x,y,z)
shortDescription: Generates a new vector based on x, y, and z values

name: Vector Display
shortDescription: Enables vectors to be displayed in the model view using an optional 'anchor point'

name: Vector Normalize
shortDescription: Returns a unit vector with the same direction as the supplied vector

name: Multiply
shortDescription: Returns the product of two numbers

name: Max
shortDescription: Returns the larger (maximum value) of two numbers

name: Min
shortDescription: Returns the smaller (minimum value) of two numbers

name: Divide
shortDescription: Divides the first input (a) by the second input (b)

name: Adde
shortDescription: Returns the sum of two numbers

name: Subtract
shortDescription: Subtracts the second input (b) from the first input (a)

name: Sine(x)
shortDescription: Returns the sine of the input angle in radians

name: Cosine(x)
shortDescription: Returns the cosine of the input angle in radians

name: Tangent(x)
shortDescription: Returns the tangent of the input angle in radians

name: Exponent a^b
shortDescription: Returns the first input (a) raised to a power of the second input (b).

name: Curve-Curve Intersection
shortDescription: Finds intersections between two given curves.
